content.value:
I came out as gay to my work colleagues and some of my friends several years ago. I came out to my family last year. Everyone is so supportive. But it still feels like I’m living a double life because I don’t discuss it publicly.

I’m changing that, starting now 🏳️‍🌈 Happy #pride !
